Replace new tab page with your employee Home to find all the knowledge, resources and the services your company is offering. Every employee can instantly see the following:

1/ Home -  Access all services on your employee portal, gathering the knowledge, the tools, the services and any useful resources

2/ Directory - All employees of your company. Easily access all your teammates information.

3/ App library -  All the SaaS applications used in your company. 

4/ Search  -  Search across company's content. People, documents, knowledge, policies, process, services, no more switch between applications.
